item.title: Quine McClusky algorithm in Haskell
item.description: A small program tingu is implemented in haskell. It reads minterms from a file and produce the output on console. It is hosted on github. You can use it like ./tingu -i minterms Your minterms should be described in a file like following vars = 4 minterms = 1,2,5,7,8,9,10,13,15, Then output of program is Hello, I am Tingu, the mighty crab! And I like tea. You should call me $./tingu -i filename from your terminal.
